reason.tex:
%text Function composition is the act of applying one function $f(x)$ on another function $g(x)$ to produce a third function $h(x)$ Mathematically, this is written as \[ \qquad h(x) = f\left[ g(x) \right] = (f\circ g)(x) \] Note that \[ \qquad (f\circ g)(x) \neq (g\circ f)(x) \] A \underline\text{couple of examples} should help clarify the concept % \begin{align} \begin{tabular}{NNNN}
\hline f(x) & g(x) & (f\circ g)(x) & (g\circ f)(x) \\ \hline x^2 & \sin x & f \left(\sin x \right) = \sin^2 x & g \left(x^2 \right) = \sin x^2 \\ \hline \tan x & \sqrt{x} & f \left(\sqrt{x} \right) = \tan\sqrt{x} & g \left(\tan x \right) = \sqrt{\tan x} \\ \hline \end{tabular} \end{align} %text %
